name: Space Stop
description:
Living in a fuel station is a rather boring life, even in space. When Noah and the station AI get word that they will both soon be made redundant, they decide to take matters into their own hands.

Space Stop is a story based shop management game set in fuel station in the middle of an asteroid field. Collaborate with the on-board AI to increase the profits earned, while also helping each other get a better life.

This game was made for Wowie Game Jam 4.0.

To play, a keyboard and mouse are ideal. 

Disclaimer: There were many last-minute build errors at the end, so I apologise for any bugs I didn't spot. To give an idea of how bad the errors were, there used to be character portraits.
